CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Mr. HAGOP GHAZARIAN, 

Kindly refer to enclosed Statement of Account (SOA) with adjudication details of claimed medical expenses as per your policy terms and conditions. 

In case you have any relevant queries kindly contact our 24 / 7 Customer Service Team at 800SMARTCARE to assist you further. 

For suspended claimed expenses, please send the required details to smartcare.claims@neuron.ae for re-assessment. 

Thank you, 
Neuron-CignaTeam 

You may view EOB in Neuron member portal. 


Please follow the below steps to access this report online:

For suspended claimed expenses, please send the required details to smartcare.claims@neuron.ae for re-assessment. 

Thank you, 
Neuron-CignaTeam 

You may view EOB in Neuron member portal. 


Please follow the below steps to access this report online: 

1. Login to the Neuron Member Portal at https://smartcarebycigna.neuron.ae/Login/Login.aspx <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/dIVOCBRk0iRBO7Lszf1c2qtjn?domain=smartcarebycigna.neuron.ae>  
2. If you havent registered, please register by clicking on the New Registration option. 
3. If registered, please login using your Neuron ID. 
4. Select the Reimbursement option to view the submitted claims and view EOB. 

This email is auto-generated. Please do not respond. 



Property of Nas Neuron Health Services
